description: The idea of Lungo arose earlier this year, the author Javi Jim√©nez Villar saw how existing Mobile Frameworks at that time were not powerful and not using the features of HTML5. They were also complex to use at the same time could not be extended visually and functionally. For this reason Javi decided to create a Mobile Framework from scratch, always on the premises that will be easy to use, semantic and exploiting the enormous capacity of HTML5.
name: Lungo.js
